name: Shumo
description:
Shumo is a turn-based Roguelike card game where you assume the role of a Shu general. Explore dungeons, gather treasures, and amass a collection of cards. Craft a distinctive combination of cards and treasures to overcome various adversaries.

Game features

Classic Battles: Commence with basic cards - attack, evade, heal, and enhance. Acquire treasures to construct your personal deck, empowering you to take on formidable foes!


Roguelike Levels: Chart your course and make decisions that influence the outcome. Each distinct choice leads to a different ending.


Unique Relics: Every relic possesses distinct characteristics and can be combined to unleash powerful magical combos.
